GLAMOS:
https://www.glamos.ch/en/#/B43-03


glaciers list: 
GLAMOS (1881-2025). The Swiss Glaciers 1880-2022/23, Glaciological Reports No 1-142, Yearbooks of the Cryospheric Commission of the Swiss Academy of Sciences (SCNAT), published since 1964 by VAW / ETH Zurich, doi:10.18752/glrep_series.


length change: 
GLAMOS (2024). Swiss Glacier Length Change, release 2024, Glacier Monitoring Switzerland, doi:10.18750/lengthchange.2024.r2024.


volume change: 
GLAMOS (2024). Swiss Glacier Volume Change, release 2024, Glacier Monitoring Switzerland, doi:10.18750/volumechange.2024.r2024.


mass balance op:
GLAMOS (2025). Swiss Glacier Mass Balance, release 2025, Glacier Monitoring Switzerland, doi:10.18750/massbalance.2025.r2025.


Meteoswiss: 
https://www.meteoswiss.admin.ch/services-and-publications/service/open-data.html
https://www.meteoswiss.admin.ch/services-and-publications/applications/ext/download-data-without-coding-skills.html#lang=en&mdt=homogenous&pgid=&sid=&col=&di=&tr=&hdr=


Davos weather data:
https://data.geo.admin.ch/ch.meteoschweiz.ogd-nbcn/dav/ogd-nbcn_dav_m.csv


Sion weather data:
https://data.geo.admin.ch/ch.meteoschweiz.ogd-nbcn/sio/ogd-nbcn_sio_m.csv


weather metadata:
https://data.geo.admin.ch/ch.meteoschweiz.ogd-nbcn/ogd-nbcn_meta_parameters.csv


ML for glaciers data predictions:

Sjursen, K. H., Bolibar, J., van der Meer, M., Andreassen, L. M., Biesheuvel, J. P., Dunse, T., Huss, M., Maussion, F., Rounce, D. R., and Tober, B.: Machine learning improves seasonal mass balance prediction for unmonitored glaciers, The Cryosphere, 19, 5801–5826, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-19-5801-2025, 2025.
https://tc.copernicus.org/articles/19/5801/2025/

Anilkumar, R., Bharti, R., Chutia, D., and Aggarwal, S. P.: Modelling point mass balance for the glaciers of the Central European Alps using machine learning techniques, The Cryosphere, 17, 2811–2828, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-17-2811-2023, 2023.
https://tc.copernicus.org/articles/17/2811/2023/


Huss, M., A. Bauder, M. Funk, and R. Hock (2008), Determination of the seasonal mass balance of four Alpine glaciers
since 1865, J. Geophys. Res., 113, F01015, doi:10.1029/2007JF000803.
https://www.parcs.ch/wja/pdf_public/2018/36097_20180323_091838_Bauder_AletschGlacierHuss_et_al-2008.pdf


https://agupubs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1029/2009JD011775


Hock R. A distributed temperature-index ice- and snowmelt model including potential direct solar radiation. Journal of Glaciology. 1999;45(149):101-111. doi:10.3189/S0022143000003087
https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/journal-of-glaciology/article/distributed-temperatureindex-ice-and-snowmelt-model-including-potential-direct-solar-radiation/2013F2D6B911401D67EA84728AF93629
